name: cloudflare-workflows
description: Build durable workflows with Cloudflare Workflows (GA April 2025). Features step.do, step.sleep, waitForEvent, Vitest testing, and runs for hours to days with automatic retries and state persistence. Use when: creating long-running workflows, implementing retry logic, building event-driven processes, testing workflows with cloudflare:test, coordinating API calls, or troubleshooting NonRetryableError, I/O context errors, serialization failures.
